record.title: MORNING BUSINESS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate now proceed to a period for the transaction of morning business, with Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 10 minutes each.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, it is my understanding the Senator from South Dakota, Mr. Thune, wishes to be recognized. Is the Senator going to use the full 10 minutes? He is entitled to it.
Mr. President, I shouldn't take that long. I guess maybe 7 minutes.
